attributes.action: Pressure the Chinese Government to free Uyghur Muslims from Concentration camps
attributes.background: A modern day holocaust is happening right this minute in China by the Chinese Government where they have detained over a million Uyghur Muslims since 2017 in concentration camps. The victims are being tortured, forced to go against their faith and women are pressured in marrying Han Chinese men.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234849
